name: Pong by AI
description:
For Global Game Jam 2023 I made a game using only Unity & AI tools: ChatGPT (GPT-3), Stable Diffusion, Dall-E 2 🎮 Goal was as little human intervention as possible & test AI for game dev. It turned out to be a DISASTER! 😬 The game AI came up with is so bad that I debated about posting this game!

Use your firewall to stop the hacker from installing a rootkit onto the computer!   Use arrow keys to move the paddle. Get to 4 points to win!
